comments.raw_text:
I am reporting this in Firefox 7, but I have seen it happen in previous versions too.

1) Open Firefox
2) Open preferences
3) Click content tab
4) Click "choose" on the languages at the bottom
5) Choose a language further down in your language list and click "move up".

Expected: The language should continue to move up the list after every click of the "move up" button until it reached the top of the list.

Actual: The language moves up once or twice and then fails to move up any further and starts swapping position above. The only way I can get a language to the top of the list is to choose another language and then choose the one I want to move again and it may continue to move up the list. This does not happen at all with the "move down" button as it does exactly as expected.
